body_html: @ck196 That's great! I've not yet implemented the bounding box regression part of the network - that's one of the things on my to-do list for this project. It should be pretty straightforward, though, if you want to try it yourself - just a couple fully connected layers on top of the ROI pooling layer if I remember correctly.

body: @ck196 That's great! I've not yet implemented the bounding box regression part of the network - that's one of the things on my to-do list for this project. It should be pretty straightforward, though, if you want to try it yourself - just a couple fully connected layers on top of the ROI pooling layer if I remember correctly.
